name: Old Harbor Park
description: A waterfront park with walking trails and a small pier.

name: Market Street Plaza
description: Open air market with local vendors and weekly events.

name: Riverside Museum
description: Local history exhibits and rotating art displays.

name: Greenway Trails
description: Interconnected trails for walking, biking, and nature viewing.

name: Downtown Theatre
description: Community theatre with monthly productions and workshops.

name: City View Lookout
description: Scenic overlook with panoramic views of the city and bay.

name: Sunrise Marina
description: Small marina with boat rentals and fishing charters.

name: Heritage Farm
description: Family farm with seasonal produce and community activities.
